results.content: It is really a good course, Backend concepts and frontend concepts are very clear.

results.content: I found this tutorial really helpful. Thanks a lot and keep the good work
results.content_html: I found this tutorial really helpful. Thanks a lot and keep the good work

results.content:
One of the first few courses on Udemy that I do not fall asleep on. 

I do agree that you need some background, otherwise you might get confused with 8 minutes for setting up project, docker and docker-compose - but if you already know what all the tech-stack is for and you just need to see good patterns for JS/Django apps, this is the perfect course :)
results.content_html:
One of the first few courses on Udemy that I do not fall asleep on.

I do agree that you need some background, otherwise you might get confused with 8 minutes for setting up project, docker and docker-compose - but if you already know what all the tech-stack is for and you just need to see good patterns for JS/Django apps, this is the perfect course :)
